div.p: EVANT ISD ALERT On Monday, March 23, we will have our second round of lesson packet pickup and return. You may come by and pickup lessons for the next week and return completed lessons. A[...] . . .

div.p: The Evant Independent School District is committed to creating an environment for excellence through an innovative and diverse curriculum which emphasizes academic, physical, social, and emotional skills in order to prepare students for the ever changing society of the 21st Century.
